pinyin: Xi1 zang4 Bai3 wan4 Nong2 nu2 Jie3 Fang4 Ji4 nian4 ri4
containing_words.word: 西藏百万农奴解放纪念日

sentences.english: Peter had a virtually inexhaustible supply of serfs.
sentences.chinese: 彼得有几乎用之不尽的农奴。

sentences.english: This caused a much higher demand for slaves to supply manual labor in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 这就需要大量的农奴进行地里的手工劳动。

sentences.english: Between the roman colon-us and the new bondsman had stood the free frankish peasant.
sentences.chinese: 介于罗马隶农和新的农奴之间的是自由的法兰克农民。

sentences.english: I am opposed to the existence of serfdom.
Therefore, in the name of religion protection, Dalai Lama instigated serfs to rebel CPC .
sentences.chinese: 达赖就以保教的名义煽动那些农奴反对中共。

sentences.english: In the uprising the serfs fought with bare hands against gunfire.
sentences.chinese: 在暴动中，农奴们以赤手空拳对付钢枪铁炮。

sentences.english: In the manor of Junker, the farmers were still in semi-serf status.
sentences.chinese: 在容克庄园中，雇农仍然处于半农奴的地位。

sentences.english: The overlords had the best of both worlds.
sentences.chinese: 这些农奴主因而享有两种体制的好处。

sentences.english: In the Middle Ages, feudal control and serfdom were universal and cruel.
sentences.chinese: 在中世纪，封建统制和农奴制度是普遍的，残酷的。

sentences.english: Serfdom also was abolished in some regions and mitigated in others.
sentences.chinese: 农奴制也在一些地区被废除或者减轻。

sentences.english: The masses of serfs and slaves had no right to receive education.
sentences.chinese: 残忍的农奴主挖掉了农奴的眼睛。

sentences.english: The masses of serfs and slaves had no right to receive education.
sentences.chinese: 残忍的农奴主挖掉了农奴的眼睛。

sentences.english: At the bottom of the feudal scale were the villeins or serfs.
sentences.chinese: 在封建等级底层的是农奴。

sentences.english: She is the illegitimate children of an unmarried female serfs.
sentences.chinese: 她是一个未婚的女农奴的私生子。

sentences.english: But his female viewpoint is closely linked up with Helot and is full of conflict and paradox.
sentences.chinese: 但他的妇女观与农奴制息息相关，充满着矛盾与悖论。

sentences.english: Making use of written or common law the serf -owners set up penitentiaries or private jails.
sentences.chinese: 农奴主运用成文法或习惯法，设立监狱或私牢。

definition: social stratum below the level of ordinary people/untouchable/dalit (India caste)
